verses.text_plain: Thus saith the Lord, The heaven is my throne, and the earth is my footstool: where is the house that ye build unto me? and where is the place of my rest?
verses.verse_html: 1Thus saith the Lord, The heaven is my throne, and the earth is my footstool: where is the house that ye build unto me? and where is the place of my rest?

verses.text_plain: For all those things hath mine hand made, and all those things have been, saith the Lord: but to this man will I look, even to him that is poor and of a contrite spirit, and trembleth at my word.
verses.verse_html: 2For all those things hath mine hand made, and all those things have been, saith the Lord: but to this man will I look, even to him that is poor and of a contrite spirit, and trembleth at my word.

verses.text_plain: He that killeth an ox is as if he slew a man; he that sacrificeth a lamb, as if he cut off a dog’s neck; he that offereth an oblation, as if he offered swine’s blood; he that burneth incense, as if he blessed an idol. Yea, they have chosen their own ways, and their soul delighteth in their abominations.
verses.verse_html:
3He that killeth an ox is as if he slew a man; he that sacrificeth a lamb, as if he cut off a dog’s neck; he that offereth an oblation, as if he offered swine’s blood; he that burneth incense, as if he blessed an idol. Yea, they have chosen their own ways, and their soul delighteth in their abominations. ▼
▼ lamb: or, kid
 , ▼
▼ burneth: Heb. maketh a memorial of

footnotes.body_text: ▼ burneth: Heb. maketh a memorial of
footnotes.body_html: ▼ burneth: Heb. maketh a memorial of

verses.text_plain: I also will choose their delusions, and will bring their fears upon them; because when I called, none did answer; when I spake, they did not hear: but they did evil before mine eyes, and chose that in which I delighted not.
verses.verse_html:
4I also will choose their delusions, and will bring their fears upon them; because when I called, none did answer; when I spake, they did not hear: but they did evil before mine eyes, and chose that in which I delighted not. ▼
▼ delusions: or, devices

tokens.text: upon them; because when I called

verses.text_plain: Hear the word of the Lord, ye that tremble at his word; Your brethren that hated you, that cast you out for my name’s sake, said, Let the Lord be glorified: but he shall appear to your joy, and they shall be ashamed.
verses.verse_html: 5Hear the word of the Lord, ye that tremble at his word; Your brethren that hated you, that cast you out for my name’s sake, said, Let the Lord be glorified: but he shall appear to your joy, and they shall be ashamed.

verses.text_plain: A voice of noise from the city, a voice from the temple, a voice of the Lord that rendereth recompence to his enemies.
verses.verse_html: 6A voice of noise from the city, a voice from the temple, a voice of the Lord that rendereth recompence to his enemies.

verses.text_plain: Before she travailed, she brought forth; before her pain came, she was delivered of a man child.
verses.verse_html: 7Before she travailed, she brought forth; before her pain came, she was delivered of a man child.

verses.text_plain: Who hath heard such a thing? who hath seen such things? Shall the earth be made to bring forth in one day? or shall a nation be born at once? for as soon as Zion travailed, she brought forth her children.
verses.verse_html: 8Who hath heard such a thing? who hath seen such things? Shall the earth be made to bring forth in one day? or shall a nation be born at once? for as soon as Zion travailed, she brought forth her children.

tokens.text: such a thing? who hath seen

verses.text_plain: Shall I bring to the birth, and not cause to bring forth? saith the Lord: shall I cause to bring forth, and shut the womb? saith thy God.
verses.verse_html:
9Shall I bring to the birth, and not cause to bring forth? saith the Lord: shall I cause to bring forth, and shut the womb? saith thy God. ▼
▼ not…: or, not beget?

tokens.text: Shall I bring to the birth
and not cause to bring forth

footnotes.body_html: ▼ not…: or, not beget?

verses.text_plain: Rejoice ye with Jerusalem, and be glad with her, all ye that love her: rejoice for joy with her, all ye that mourn for her:
verses.verse_html: 10Rejoice ye with Jerusalem, and be glad with her, all ye that love her: rejoice for joy with her, all ye that mourn for her:

tokens.text: with her, all ye that love
with her, all ye that mourn

verses.text_plain: That ye may suck, and be satisfied with the breasts of her consolations; that ye may milk out, and be delighted with the abundance of her glory.
verses.verse_html:
11That ye may suck, and be satisfied with the breasts of her consolations; that ye may milk out, and be delighted with the abundance of her glory. ▼
▼ abundance: or, brightness

verses.text_plain: For thus saith the Lord, Behold, I will extend peace to her like a river, and the glory of the Gentiles like a flowing stream: then shall ye suck, ye shall be borne upon her sides, and be dandled upon her knees.
verses.verse_html: 12For thus saith the Lord, Behold, I will extend peace to her like a river, and the glory of the Gentiles like a flowing stream: then shall ye suck, ye shall be borne upon her sides, and be dandled upon her knees.

verses.text_plain: As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you; and ye shall be comforted in Jerusalem.
verses.verse_html: 13As one whom his mother comforteth, so will I comfort you; and ye shall be comforted in Jerusalem.

tokens.text: you; and ye shall be comforted

verses.text_plain: And when ye see this, your heart shall rejoice, and your bones shall flourish like an herb: and the hand of the Lord shall be known toward his servants, and his indignation toward his enemies.
verses.verse_html: 14And when ye see this, your heart shall rejoice, and your bones shall flourish like an herb: and the hand of the Lord shall be known toward his servants, and his indignation toward his enemies.

verses.text_plain: For, behold, the Lord will come with fire, and with his chariots like a whirlwind, to render his anger with fury, and his rebuke with flames of fire.
verses.verse_html: 15For, behold, the Lord will come with fire, and with his chariots like a whirlwind, to render his anger with fury, and his rebuke with flames of fire.

verses.text_plain: For by fire and by his sword will the Lord plead with all flesh: and the slain of the Lord shall be many.
verses.verse_html: 16For by fire and by his sword will the Lord plead with all flesh: and the slain of the Lord shall be many.

verses.text_plain: They that sanctify themselves, and purify themselves in the gardens behind one tree in the midst, eating swine’s flesh, and the abomination, and the mouse, shall be consumed together, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
17They that sanctify themselves, and purify themselves in the gardens behind one tree in the midst, eating swine’s flesh, and the abomination, and the mouse, shall be consumed together, saith the Lord. ▼
▼ behind…: or, one after another

footnotes.body_html: ▼ behind…: or, one after another

verses.text_plain: For I know their works and their thoughts: it shall come, that I will gather all nations and tongues; and they shall come, and see my glory.
verses.verse_html: 18For I know their works and their thoughts: it shall come, that I will gather all nations and tongues; and they shall come, and see my glory.

verses.text_plain: And I will set a sign among them, and I will send those that escape of them unto the nations, to Tarshish, Pul, and Lud, that draw the bow, to Tubal, and Javan, to the isles afar off, that have not heard my fame, neither have seen my glory; and they shall declare my glory among the Gentiles.
verses.verse_html: 19And I will set a sign among them, and I will send those that escape of them unto the nations, to Tarshish, Pul, and Lud, that draw the bow, to Tubal, and Javan, to the isles afar off, that have not heard my fame, neither have seen my glory; and they shall declare my glory among the Gentiles.

tokens.text: among them, and I will send

verses.text_plain: And they shall bring all your brethren for an offering unto the Lord out of all nations upon horses, and in chariots, and in litters, and upon mules, and upon swift beasts, to my holy mountain Jerusalem, saith the Lord, as the children of Israel bring an offering in a clean vessel into the house of the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
20And they shall bring all your brethren for an offering unto the Lord out of all nations upon horses, and in chariots, and in litters, and upon mules, and upon swift beasts, to my holy mountain Jerusalem, saith the Lord, as the children of Israel bring an offering in a clean vessel into the house of the Lord. ▼
▼ litters: or, coaches

verses.text_plain: And I will also take of them for priests and for Levites, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html: 21And I will also take of them for priests and for Levites, saith the Lord.

verses.text_plain: For as the new heavens and the new earth, which I will make, shall remain before me, saith the Lord, so shall your seed and your name remain.
verses.verse_html: 22For as the new heavens and the new earth, which I will make, shall remain before me, saith the Lord, so shall your seed and your name remain.

verses.text_plain: And it shall come to pass, that from one new moon to another, and from one sabbath to another, shall all flesh come to worship before me, saith the Lord.
verses.verse_html:
23And it shall come to pass, that from one new moon to another, and from one sabbath to another, shall all flesh come to worship before me, saith the Lord. ▼
▼ from one new…: Heb. from new moon to his new moon, and from sabbath to his sabbath

footnotes.body_text: ▼ from one new…: Heb. from new moon to his new moon, and from sabbath to his sabbath
footnotes.body_html: ▼ from one new…: Heb. from new moon to his new moon, and from sabbath to his sabbath

verses.text_plain: And they shall go forth, and look upon the carcases of the men that have transgressed against me: for their worm shall not die, neither shall their fire be quenched; and they shall be an abhorring unto all flesh.
verses.verse_html: 24And they shall go forth, and look upon the carcases of the men that have transgressed against me: for their worm shall not die, neither shall their fire be quenched; and they shall be an abhorring unto all flesh.

tokens.text: and they shall be an abhorring
